name: Meter
description: Deal damage to fill up a gauge in order to be able to enhance some of your moves
Use a mixture of mids and lows to keep your opponent guessing

name: Poking
description: Make use of a hit & run tactic to take your opponent by surprise and deal a death by a thousand cuts

name: Keep Out
description: Make use of a bunch of projectiles to keep you at a fair distance

name: Zoner
description: Your strong mid-long range projectiles are meant to keep your opponent at bay. They have to stay there.

name: Evasive
description: Slip through pressure. Works best against aggressive opponents, but has weak tracking

name: FTTAWSBFTMA
description: Short for "Flying Through The Air With Some Bullshit From Ten Miles Away". Projectiles are included, the need to press forward in order to move is not.

name: Long Reach
description: Unleash an oppressive offense from the safety of mid-range with your longer-than-average attacks

name: Rushdown
description: Get in your opponent's face with your faster movement speed and use your strong up-close pressure to get aggressive on them. Unga bunga brother.

name: Versatile
description: Jack of all trades, master of none

name: Grappler
description: Make them regret letting you in. Your command grabs are meant to exploit mistakes.

name: Mishima
description: I'm not gonna sugarcoat it. ➡️⭐⬇️↘️✊, flash punch combo, and wavedash mix-ups. Be grateful the receding hairline isn't part of the package.

name: Deflection
description: Become Mr. Steal-yo-turn with all those parries

name: Counter Hit
description: With your strong and safe moves, you can easily exploit your opponent's mistakes

name: Lockdown
description: Become hard to challenge and be aggressive

name: Law
description: Cast your line and fish for pokes and counter hits, you got the tools to deal with them

name: Set Up
description: You're playing chess, setting up your big damage move that will win you the round
